page.title: 07THE CHERRY TREE PUB IN H.B.
page.content: Mr and Mrs Cave like living in the village because they were brought up in a city.They are living in the village because it is quieter. They are particularly fond of the country side.They used to live in Nottingham and after they got married they moved to Birmingham and lived there for 11 years.Then they moved to Lichfield then to Sibbertoft and from there to Husbands Bosworth where they have lived for 6 years. The number of customers they have in a week depends on what is happening.In a normal week they would have between 1000 to 2000 people.At other times when they are doing a party they have a few more people.Most of the customers come from the villages near by in the winter.But in the summer people who are passing by stop.About 60% come from villages and 40% come in cars that pass by.
